data.message: Diagnose Duro MCP freeze issue and add SQLite busy_timeout: Added _connect() helper with PRAGMA busy_timeout=5000 to index.py (28 connections updated), added busy_timeout to health check in duro_mcp_server.py, added model load logging with timing to embeddings.py. All tests pass, system healthy.
